name: Annie Dean
text: This place is great! The staff were so friendly, welcoming, and energetic. They did a great job of explaining the process and options to me (I'd never been before), and I was impressed with the quality and presentation of the final product. Bonus points for everyone being masked up. :)

text: Cool place for a date, meeting, and family dinner. Being able to make your own style pizza is pretty awesome.

name: Ali Sha
text: I enjoy the pizza! Only place I can grab a vegan pizza without have to bust out the dough at home. I will say that I'm concerned  about cross contamination?! Especially  since they store the allergen pizza cutter next to the regular  one also i dont think they switch gloves between  meat and veggies ü§î

text: Had a wonderful first experience.  I thought the staff was very well trained, friendly and efficient especially for being open only a few days and a line out the door the pressure was on and I still had my food pretty quick.  Great food, great service.  I will visit again.
